title: Sketch Class: Drawing as Social Commentary
description:
>Six Thursdays:
July 13-August 17
5:30pm-7:30pm

class="MsoNoSpacing">Multi-session sketch classes offer the chance to draw in the museum's galleries under the guidance of experienced instructors. All materials will be provided.

>Use your capacity for social observation and your humor to make drawings that reflect, comment, and critique life's challenges and follies. Find inspiration in the politically engaged drawings of Saul Steinberg and Cauleen Smith features in the Prints and Drawings Galleries.

>Click here to see all upcoming sketch classes and workshops. For additional information, please call (312) 443-3680 or e-mail museum-programs@artic.edu. Classes are recommended for ages 16 and up.
